name: Maze Shooting Game
description:
First person shooting game in a maze environment.  Built for computer. Player roam around and shooting using keyboard key "WASD" and mouse for direction & shooting.  Best screen size at 1920 pixel x 1080 pixel.

The game built with Web 3.0 login with crypto-wallet for balance checking purpose only and no transaction in-built. Otherwise, player can always log in without crypto-wallet.

Simple but challenging game. Hope you enjoy it!
